title: 2XE1/DS1 PSEUDO WIRE TDM SFP CONFIGURATION COMMAND
description:
This command allows the operator to configure pseudowire TDM parameters on the 
2xE1/DS1 sfp:
user_level:
The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.
syntax: > configure equipment sfpe1t1 ( no pwtdm (position) ) | ( pwtdm (position) channel <Eqpt::Channel> packet-length <Eqpt::Packetlength> jitter-buff-size <Eqpt::JitBufSize> vlanid <Eqpt::VlanId> priority <Eqpt::Priority> conseq-number <Eqpt::ConseqNo> ecid-rx <Eqpt::ECID> ecid-tx <Eqpt::ECID> source-mac <Eqpt::PhysicalAddress> dest-mac <Eqpt::PhysicalAddress> )

command_parameters.name: channel
command_parameters.description: open or close the channel mandatory parameter

command_parameters.name: packet-length
command_parameters.description: packet length can be configured from 0 to 16382, packet length for MEF8 is 256 bytes mandatory parameter - packet length range - range: [0...16382]

command_parameters.name: jitter-buff-size
command_parameters.description: jitter buffer size can be configured from 0 to 1023,units in number of MEF8 packets mandatory parameter - jitter buffer size - range: [0...1023]

command_parameters.name: vlanid
command_parameters.description: vlan id can be configured from 0 to 4095 mandatory parameter - vlan index - range: [0...4095]

command_parameters.name: priority
command_parameters.description: 802.1p priority range 0 to 7 mandatory parameter - priority range 0 to 7 - range: [0...7]

command_parameters.name: conseq-number
command_parameters.description: consequence number range 0 to 7 mandatory parameter - consequence range 0 to 7,0: no control, 1-6:number of packets out of sequence - range: [0...7]

command_parameters.name: ecid-rx
command_parameters.description: receive emulated circuit identifier  range 0 to 1048575 mandatory parameter - Emulated circuit identifierrange 0 to 1048575 - range: [0...1048575]

command_parameters.name: ecid-tx
command_parameters.description: transmit emulated circuit identifier  range 0 to 1048575 mandatory parameter - Emulated circuit identifierrange 0 to 1048575 - range: [0...1048575]

command_parameters.name: source-mac
command_parameters.description: source mac address mandatory parameter - media dependent physical address - length: 6

command_parameters.name: dest-mac
command_parameters.description: destination mac address mandatory parameter - media dependent physical address - length: 6

raw:
help configure equipment sfpe1t1 pwtdm
2XE1/DS1 PSEUDO WIRE TDM SFP CONFIGURATION COMMAND
==================================================

Command Description
-------------------

This command allows the operator to configure pseudowire TDM parameters on the 
2xE1/DS1 sfp:


User Level
----------

The command can be accessed by operators with equipment privileges, and 
executed by operators with equipment privileges.

Command Syntax
--------------

The command has the following syntax:
> configure equipment sfpe1t1 ( no pwtdm (position) ) | ( pwtdm (position) 
channel <Eqpt::Channel> packet-length <Eqpt::Packetlength> jitter-buff-size 
<Eqpt::JitBufSize> vlanid <Eqpt::VlanId> priority <Eqpt::Priority> 
conseq-number <Eqpt::ConseqNo> ecid-rx <Eqpt::ECID> ecid-tx <Eqpt::ECID> 
source-mac <Eqpt::PhysicalAddress> dest-mac <Eqpt::PhysicalAddress> )

Command Parameters
------------------

Table "2xE1/DS1 Pseudo Wire TDM SFP configuration Command" Resource Parameters

Resource Identifier        Description

(position)                 the physical sfp cage position

Table "2xE1/DS1 Pseudo Wire TDM SFP configuration Command" Command Parameters

Parameter                  Description

channel                    open or close the channel 
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::Channel>
                           Format:
                           ( close
                           | open )
                           Possible values:
                           - close                 : close channel
                           - open                  : open channel

packet-length              packet length can be configured from 0 to 16382, 
packet length for MEF8 is 256 bytes  
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::Packetlength>
                           Format:
                           - packet length range 
                           - range: [0...16382]

jitter-buff-size           jitter buffer size can be configured from 0 to 
1023,units in number of MEF8 packets  
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::JitBufSize>
                           Format:
                           - jitter buffer size 
                           - range: [0...1023]

vlanid                     vlan id can be configured from 0 to 4095
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::VlanId>
                           Format:
                           - vlan index 
                           - range: [0...4095]

priority                   802.1p priority range 0 to 7
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::Priority>
                           Format:
                           - priority range 0 to 7
                           - range: [0...7]

conseq-number              consequence number range 0 to 7
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::ConseqNo>
                           Format:
                           - consequence range 0 to 7,0: no control, 1-6:number 
of packets out of sequence
                           - range: [0...7]

ecid-rx                    receive emulated circuit identifier  range 0 to 
1048575
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::ECID>
                           Format:
                           - Emulated circuit identifierrange 0 to 1048575
                           - range: [0...1048575]

ecid-tx                    transmit emulated circuit identifier  range 0 to 
1048575
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::ECID>
                           Format:
                           - Emulated circuit identifierrange 0 to 1048575
                           - range: [0...1048575]

source-mac                 source mac address
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::PhysicalAddress>
                           Format:
                           - media dependent physical address
                           - length: 6 

dest-mac                   destination mac address
                           mandatory parameter

                           Parameter type: <Eqpt::PhysicalAddress>
                           Format:
                           - media dependent physical address
                           - length: 6 


DS-LIN-TEST-01:automationuser>#
